subtitles:
42937 46216 ( Girl ) People once believed
that when someone dies...

46296 50416 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

53775 58815 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

61894 66694 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

118727 123046 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

123126 126246 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

129685 133485 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

135804 138884 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

140324 143043 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

143123 147803 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

150642 153842 ( Man ) You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

153922 158521 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

158601 160801 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

160841 163601 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

163681 166160 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

166240 169560 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

169640 172519 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

180398 184438 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

184518 186638 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

186718 190477 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

202875 206755 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

206795 209954 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
216114 218273 You lied to her about Eric.

219953 223513 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

234511 239990 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.

261508 265387 ( Sarah ) A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

265467 268227 I used to think that was true
about everything...

272586 276386 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

276426 280625 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

317300 320380 What are you,
like the night watchman?

340817 344056 You know, what this place
needs is a...

346456 350696 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

350736 353615 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
353695 355895 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
355975 358894 Hey, hey, let me do it.

358974 362854 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

362894 365254 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

365294 367173 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

376572 380252 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

380332 384091 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

385971 389490 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

389570 392650 - They make you fart big time.
- ( Chuckling )

398729 401329 ( Man ) You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

401409 403928 from all the crap
floating around in it.

405048 408648 I wish I could have seen that.
( Whistling )

508314 512074 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

534111 537351 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

544310 546789 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

554508 557068 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

557148 560308 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- ( Woman Shouting )

671813 676212 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.

685811 688770 - ( Shelly ) No! Eric!
- ( Man ) See ya!

737284 740083 - Hey, that's good.
- ( Man ) That's good.

743803 747242 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

750442 754721 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

758241 760161 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

763240 766800 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?

790597 794716 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

794796 798516 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

798596 801555 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
801635 804315 Fire it up! Fire it up!

807434 809314 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

843270 846629 - I love you.
- Say that again.

859827 862867 - ( Sarah ) Wow, you look great.
- ( Shelly ) Ta-da!

869626 872106 - Come here! ( Laughing )
- No, no, no!
916980 920379 * It doesn't matter how you hide *
920459 923659 * We find you if we're wanting to *

925939 929618 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

929658 933698 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

968733 972572 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
974972 979291 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

983811 986330 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

986410 989130 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

997609 1000649 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- ( Siren Wailing )

1003648 1005928 Close the gate
when you go out!

1006008 1008568 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1011127 1014407 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1018926 1023206 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1043243 1047842 * That point me to another day *

1123952 1126952 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1177145 1179665 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1179745 1183664 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1183744 1187024 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1187064 1189543 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1189623 1194263 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1194343 1199102 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1204541 1210101 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1218939 1223659 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1223739 1228178 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1232697 1235137 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1269973 1275612 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1283171 1287330 - Look at this mess!
What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.
1292290 1294329 * No, they don't have to take you *

1294409 1297049 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1297129 1301528 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1301608 1304768 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1305848 1307687 Give me some of that
over there!

1309847 1313407 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1313447 1318046 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1318086 1321766 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1321846 1325885 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1325925 1329844 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1371039 1375518 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1411754 1417633 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1423992 1427031 ( Man ) Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1444869 1450188 - ( Clearing Throat )
- I told you to stay out of here.

1450228 1453748 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1453828 1457707 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1463347 1466226 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1471705 1475225 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
- ( Laughing )
1489623 1491983 Who the fuck is this now?

1498742 1502421 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1509700 1513780 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1521139 1525338 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1525378 1529178 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."

1536017 1539976 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1542296 1545136 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1575612 1580691 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1582251 1585570 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1588170 1591689 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1598768 1601608 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1601688 1604608 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1604688 1607367 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1607447 1611447 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1611527 1616046 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1616126 1617966 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1618046 1621645 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1622805 1625125 What the hell
do you call that?

1628684 1632324 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1632364 1635044 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1644362 1646882 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1646922 1649722 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1649802 1654001 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1654081 1659360 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1662800 1665280 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1681477 1685517 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1708434 1711233 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1714353 1717073 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1717153 1719672 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1719752 1722032 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1722112 1726991 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1733710 1736350 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1736430 1738990 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1740589 1743829 Each one of these is a life...

1752588 1756587 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1764866 1768906 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1770705 1774625 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1774705 1778184 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1801621 1804941 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1811860 1816139 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1830417 1834177 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1834257 1839216 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1842496 1846695 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1846775 1849775 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1851575 1854614 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1854694 1858534 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1861213 1865653 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1865693 1870332 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1870412 1874692 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1874772 1877091 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1877171 1881571 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1881651 1884130 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1884210 1887570 - ( Looter ) Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1887650 1892769 - ( Glass Shattering )
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1892849 1896369 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1901888 1905167 - ( Woman Laughing )
- ( Looter ) Leave it, run!

1914566 1917046 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1917126 1919326 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1919406 1925005 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1933044 1936123 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1936203 1940283 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1974998 1978798 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1978878 1981957 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1982037 1983717 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1986437 1989636 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1989676 1991876 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1991956 1996355 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1996395 1998875 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

1998955 2001994 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2004554 2007034 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2007114 2009793 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.

2012593 2016473 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2016553 2020832 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2020912 2022672 Call it my need to know.

2062346 2065506 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2069225 2073345 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2073425 2076345 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2080304 2084863 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2085983 2089343 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2105581 2109980 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2110060 2114219 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2117659 2121698 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"

2123818 2126578 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2126658 2130577 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2130657 2136297 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2136376 2139776 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2139856 2143696 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2150415 2154014 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2156174 2160733 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2195529 2199048 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2222925 2225445 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **

2262160 2266519 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2273118 2276038 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2283637 2288276 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2290196 2294915 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2318512 2321112 Stop me if you heard this one.

2329191 2331830 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2335390 2337550 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2342829 2347228 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2349348 2353267 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2376504 2378424 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2381344 2383943 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2415939 2420258 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2420338 2424898 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2434897 2439496 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2468052 2471572 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2474851 2478091 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2492809 2495288 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2495368 2497728 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2497808 2500608 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2500688 2503367 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2511926 2515486 - You stay put right there.
- ( Groaning )

2556400 2561920 ( Man On Radio ) As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2561960 2564599 - ( Door Squeaking )
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2564679 2567519 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2567599 2570438 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2570478 2572558 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2572638 2574678 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2574758 2579317 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2582277 2585636 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2591636 2595195 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2595275 2597435 You still have your hat on.
2612633 2616752 are you some kind of... ghost?

2625991 2630350 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2632270 2636190 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2636270 2639229 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2639309 2643709 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2646388 2650548 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2650628 2653707 Her body finally just gave it up.

2653747 2657467 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2684223 2686223 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2686303 2691542 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2691622 2696182 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2696222 2699061 Give me something
I could work with.

2703701 2706100 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2706180 2709380 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2709460 2712779 would talk after
what happened to you?

2716019 2718579 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2724378 2728657 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2733337 2737176 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2737256 2740616 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2752814 2757093 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2761573 2764652 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2768132 2770732 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2773651 2779250 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2789889 2793249 ( Gideon ) I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2793329 2796328 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2796408 2799328 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2799408 2802527 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2802567 2805007 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2805087 2809326 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2814286 2816645 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2816725 2819125 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2819205 2824484 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2827284 2832163 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2839162 2841482 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2841562 2843482 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2843522 2847041 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2847121 2850921 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2851001 2854960 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2857640 2862599 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2862679 2865799 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? ( Laughing )

2869158 2872198 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2872278 2874438 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2874518 2877877 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2877997 2881317 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2881397 2884636 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

2886916 2890556 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2893635 2898115 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2898194 2902394 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2902434 2905034 I ain't making all this up.

2905114 2909433 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2917672 2922471 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2932310 2935190 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2944108 2946308 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2948948 2953627 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2953707 2957467 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3026217 3028057 * It can't rain all the time *

3028137 3032457 ( Skipping )
* Can't rain all the time *

3041175 3043775 ( T-bird ) I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3043855 3046655 One part falls, it all falls!

3046735 3050054 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3050094 3052574 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fucking voodoo doll!

3057653 3061693 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3111446 3114885 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3142002 3145121 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3155720 3159959 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

3161519 3164279 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3164359 3167318 - This is business, right?
- ( Gun Cocks ) Faster.

3174238 3176557 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3178077 3180957 - What in the crap--
- ( Tires Screech, Siren Wails )

3187076 3189675 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3195035 3197874 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3203674 3206313 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3225151 3227270 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3237909 3241988 - ( Engine Rattling )
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3254747 3258306 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

3280463 3283583 But I don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3283623 3286303 What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3286343 3289342 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

3289382 3291462 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3291542 3294661 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3294741 3298181 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3298261 3301540 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3301620 3304740 It's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3304820 3309539 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3320098 3325097 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

3325137 3329057 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

3329217 3332976 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3333056 3336376 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3336416 3338696 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3343135 3345975 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3355773 3358613 and felt how awful goodness is."

3425724 3427924 ( Woman ) This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3428004 3430243 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3430283 3434483 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night"...

3434563 3437842 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3437922 3443082 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3443122 3448081 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3448161 3451640 The mayor has fire fighters
from all surrounding counties--

3451720 3455360 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3457320 3459919 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3459999 3464719 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when I was five.

3464799 3468758 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3468838 3472038 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3472078 3476997 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3482636 3487676 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3490075 3494195 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3517872 3520671 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3520751 3523871 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3523951 3527990 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3529990 3531870 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3543508 3546908 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3550187 3552507 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3552587 3556306 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3556386 3558426 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3558506 3561266 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3561306 3564145 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3564225 3566065 and you're saying this is
just a fucking automobile accident?

3566145 3568345 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3568425 3570344 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3570424 3572344 You gotta write that shit down.

3574304 3577264 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3577304 3581103 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3584823 3588662 ( Dials Phone )
Yeah, give me the lab.

3637336 3639815 ( Shelly ) One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3639895 3642615 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3736722 3740322 You said,
"Can't rain all the time."
3740402 3743521 That is from your song, right?

3753040 3756040 - ( Cawing )
- Come on, Eric. I know you're here.
